snippet.title: Rue Valley - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Get a glimpse at the comic-book aesthetic style world and time loop mystery of Rue Valley in this reveal trailer for the upcoming isometric narrative RPG from publisher Owlcat Games (the creators of Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader and Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous), alongside developer Emotion Spark Studio. Rue Valley will be available on PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG).

Rue Valley is about a man trapped in a time loop who is dealing with mental challenges. As the players navigate the world and deal with the tough emotions of the main character, they'll need to understand the true nature of what's happening in Rue Valley.
